sentences.english: Pu Song Ling, the original author of Liao Zhai, died three centuries ago.
sentences.chinese: 聊斋的原作者蒲松龄死于三个世纪以前。

sentences.english: "Painted Skin" is adapted from the ancient novel "Liaozhai Zhiyi", or "Strange Stories from a Chinese Studio", written by Pu Songling in the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《画皮》取材于清代蒲松龄的古代小说《聊斋志异》。

sentences.english: Pu seventies also want to test Beijing, but still not in the.
sentences.chinese: 蒲松龄七十多岁还欲进京考试，但是还是不中。

sentences.english: I remember when Mr. PU have a lot of beard, and is also busy to the exam.
sentences.chinese: 想当年蒲松龄先生胡子都一大把了，还忙着去赶考。
